name: Escape From Planet Death
description:
A game about getting off of a barren planet as quickly as possible, just to do it all over again. Balance your temperature and watch out for meteorites.

Made by:

Chuckleslord - Programming

Glademist -  Sound and Game Design

Jexzis - Art

Mitch - Programming

Ray - Art

For the DK30 Day/Night themed game jam.
